title: Tailored excellence

paragraphs.p1: Nectar Wine Merchant is an independent Bordeaux wine merchant, known for its precise and demanding sourcing of fine wines. Each selection is built bottle by bottle with a single objective: offering exceptional wines, perfectly mastered.
paragraphs.p2: We work in direct relationship with estates and a handful of carefully selected partners. Vintages, provenance, storage conditions: every detail matters. It is a haute couture approach, designed for clients who expect tailor-made service rather than a catalogue.
paragraphs.p3: 99% of our volumes are shipped internationally through a discreet network of specialist distributors, private cellars and fine dining establishments. A clientele that is both prestigious and discreet, who trust us for the quality of our sourcing and the reliability of our distribution.

signature: Recognised expertise • Precision sourcing • International distribution
